I've heard that the community for this game isn't the best but I like playing it with my brother and recommended it to my friends so we can play together too! I am a horror fan and love seeing the classic characters depicted in-game. This game is the most enjoyable when you have a good team of people who understand the importance of teamwork and what it can do in this game.
Not a single bug only features.

Great game, stopped playing due to ping and exploits in the previous matchmaking system and came back when dedicated servers were introduced. The game is more alive than ever with more regular updates than when it was released. A graphic update came a couple of weeks a go and it has been a great refresh for the game. My second favorite game behind Rocket League. 10/10

The attempt of a boycott is currently underway for Dead by Daylight. For the next 3 months we are going to cease all sales, and stop buying everything BHVR releases. This includes cosmetics, rifts, and the next Chapter. BHVR has treated the health of the game poorly and ignored the community for the past 2 years, with it only getting worse and worse. If you are reading this and want DBD, wait for the next 3 months before you get it, and check in to see if anything has changed.

It's a fun game, has some decent jump scares, fun killers, and just overall a cool game. Does have the occasional bug, but would def recommend if looking for a good horror game to play with friends.
É um jogo interessante, ótimas técnicas de jogatina. Muito bom! :)

After 600+ hours still getting jump scared. New characters, perks, map keep the game interesting and fun. Fun to play with friends, or against a group of friends as killer for a challenge. Requires a little grind in the beginning to get all the perks, and there are often game altering bugs, but are typically taken care of on the next couple of patches. There are events throughout the year that usually bring back players who haven't played in a while, and reward you for playing (cosmetics and extra bloodpoints). The community (for the most part) is incredibly friendly regardless of the outcome of the game, killers are often sympathetic to survivors who have a dc. Overall, very enjoyable game, DLC feels worth it (got mine on sale), endless hours of fun.
Great game love getting hunted down and killed :)
They updated it and new the game is whack don;'t play it the games ruined. Surviors speed doesn't exitst the killers to lung further, pallet stuns do nothing you are pretty much screwed.
Моя любимая игра. Хорошее комьюнити, уникальный геймплей и просто любовь!

I like the game but if you wanna buy this to play the killer just don't bother, 99.9% of the survivors a pretty toxic and seem to have played since day one stacking up on all the most annoying perks and always teabagging you and abusing the auto aim of your lunge, that can't be turned off, and abusing the killers camera by just spassing back and forth which makes it incredible hard to hit any of them unless you know what you're doing. As a game that should make you feel like you're this horrible monster murderer chasing helpless victims through the abandoned whatever it fails by making the survivors feel like a couple of teenage douchebags pranking an old guy. While better killers than me and plenty of practice will make this less of a problem there is people that actually band together with some friends with builts made to bully the killer and when you 'win' it might be against people who are new to the game and sometimes ends up making me feel straight up bad because they clearly aren't that good so I just let some of them go or leave them alone on purpose because I want them to have fun too. I dunno what to say but if you're hoping for a kind of killer power trip you're not really gonna get it here without putting in some hours and probably watching some videos.
It has its flaws but all around a solid game to play solo or survive with friends

Оптимизация игры - говно, подбор соперников - говно.

Данная игра интересна, ровно первые часов 40. Но дальше выявляется её главный недостаток, а именно НУДНОСТЬ. Каждая игра однотипна. Нет никакого смысла в рангах, ибо человека имеющего начинающий ранг спокойно подкидывает к играм высших рангов. В большинстве случаев  просто халтурные анимации.  Постоянные проблемы с подключением других игроков. Огромное, просто огромное количество читеров, иногда не сразу можно распознать софт. Игроки из раза в раз повторяют одни и те же действия, что полностью убивает какой-либо интерес к игре. Что уж говорить про регистрацию попаданий по игрокам. Регистрирует в среднем 2/3 попадания. В общем, если подвести итог, игра не стоит никаких денег, не тратьте своё время.
